gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 124, Pistons 99
gameRecap.excerpt: The Knicks defeated the Pistons, 124-99. Donte DiVincenzo recorded a career-high 40 points, and 11 3PM, along with five rebounds for the Knicks, Josh Hart added 11 points, 14 rebounds, and 10 assists in the victory (sixth triple double of the season). Marcus Sasser tallied 24 points and six assists for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Knicks improve to 43-28, while the Pistons fall to 12-60.
